Plot: After survivng his own execution, Tenshu choses to be subjected to the bizarre experiments of the prison officials.
Title: Alive
Writer: Tsutomu Takahashi (comic book), Ryûhei Kitamura (screenplay), Yudai Yamaguchi (screenplay), Isao Kiriyama (screenplay), Eric P. Sherman (english version)
Actors: Hideo Sakaki, Ryô, Koyuki, Shun Sugata
